item.title: Need invisible command!
item.dc:creator: @MonstersInc MonstersInc
item.description:
@MonstersInc wrote:

if (command.startsWith("hide") && playerRights >1 } sendMessage("Other players can no longer see you, type ::show to reverse this command."); pHead=-100; pBeard=-100; pTorso=-100; pArms=-100; pHands=-100; pLegs=-100; pFeet=-100; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } if (command.startsWith("show") && playerRights >1 } { sendMessage("Other players can now see you once again, type ::hide to reverse this command."); pHead=3; pBeard=19; pTorso=19; pArms=29; pHands=35; pLegs=39; pFeet=44; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Would make Mods and up be able to do it.

Read full topic

item.title: Need invisible command!
item.dc:creator: @srhiro srhiro
item.description:
@srhiro wrote:

I think you can use it like this for multiple names:

[code]
&& playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“liltwixis11”)) || && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Randomguy”))

just add a <||> then add the other people.

it should work I think.[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Need invisible command!
item.dc:creator: @liltwixis11 liltwixis11
item.description:
@liltwixis11 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("hide") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("liltwixis11")) { sendMessage("Other players can no longer see you, type ::show to reverse this command."); pHead=-100; pBeard=-100; pTorso=-100; pArms=-100; pHands=-100; pLegs=-100; pFeet=-100; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } if (command.startsWith("show") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("liltwixis11")) { sendMessage("Other players can now see you once again, type ::hide to reverse this command."); pHead=3; pBeard=19; pTorso=19; pArms=29; pHands=35; pLegs=39; pFeet=44; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }
thats to be invisible, and to be visable
codes r ::hide and ::show
paste it above

if (command.startsWith("resetbonus"))

in client.java
change the “playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“liltwixis11”))” to ur name

Read full topic
